column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH: On the morning of January 13
column4: 2020 the Department of Immigration cooperated with the police station at Penh International Airport to expel 16 Chinese nationals.------According to the Immigration Department
column5: 15 suspects were detained by the National Police for telecommunication fraud (VOIP) and another was detained trying to enter the country when wanted for a criminal offense committed in China.------They left on flight ------KR929------
column6: together with Chinese police to escort them. All were banned from returning for 3 years.------Source and images: ------General Department of Immigration
